title: Trust me I'm a Siontist

embed.description: One small step for man, One giant leap for Siontist Kind. For more of my gaming videos check out: https://www.youtube.com/user/TheKnobGG Come play and chat with us in our Teamspeak potash-98ch.typefrag.com:8240 RiP Jonny Bravo

body:
One small step for man, One giant leap for Siontist Kind

Any questions on build order or meta game calls shoot me a question <3

replies.body: _This thread has been archived. Commenting and voting have been disabled._
Nice blind unstoppable onslaughts!

You should probably actually watch and listen to the whole thing before "red" posting this.

Far from something you should be promoting.
I fail to see what you mean.
swearing isn't against TOS and while what he says about soraka might not be PC its to his friends and not in game
He shouldn't promote playing the game?
uh why?
dont get it
Sometimes you just gota go for it.
When is the update gonna happen when if sion gets a kill during ult he keeps going???

Really nice video. You're the very model of a Siontist... Valoranian.

(I'm sorry that was the only appropriate thing I could think of that rhymed with "salarian").
{{champion:14}} No apologies nessisary thats 100% acceptable xD
<3 hat last kill on to vayne, so shreked
damn that was nice awesome turnaround with the last clip with vayne damn that right there is some awesome shit
Shoulda seen here messages afterwards xD
I suddenly feel like playing Sion
My work hear is done. *Whipes off his hands and dropes the mic*

AD Sion has always been a solid build. Just hard to pull off because you need tons of stacks to make up for the health since you aren't building straight tank as usual.

But the Q's are just so god damn satisfying when you build AD.

And the ending with Cho'Gath and Vayne: PRICELESS.

{{champion:14}} Yeah I really do prefer FULL ad Sion appose to tank. He is so deadly.
Epically now with the new Black cleaver there are a lot of good AD items with HP
-Black Cleaver
-Tri Force
-Frozen Mallet
Is Black Cleaver really such a good choice?  It looks like you don't hit enough times for it to be really worth it (at least the passive part).

{{champion:14}} Your absolutely right black cleaver isn’t optimal for Sion’s basic attacks, but black cleaver isn’t only on hit, it’s any physical damage source so when I ult in and hit 2-3 people with ULT and then my Q I debuff them all. I don’t always build it but in that particular game my team was heavy AD so I thought having that extra bit of reach for my team was necessary. Also I just wanted to try out the new item 

Ok, so it isn't a core item but a situational grab.

I also knew the whole "on physical damage proc" thing, it just looked like it took you about 4-5 hits (I include any damage as a hit) to kill people so you wouldn't be making full use of the BC stacks.
Yeah its defenetly situational, more of an experiment if anything.
As i fellow sion main. I respect this video
fist bump
I really wanna leave a funny pun here, but I can't think of any.
YOUR A DISSAPOINTMENT!
I know! I'm sorry Siontist-sama D:

{{champion:14}} A day will come in a far distant future where you will become enlightened with the mental fortitude to conjure up endless amounts of Sion puns, but only after rigorious training is such a task met.
A+ for that pun, though.

You hero!

To which you respond "I'm not a hero, I'm a Siontist".
This guy has the right idea!
"Stupid Unicorn Ass Healing Cunt" ROFL
She was being anoying gota speak my mind.
Upvoted for pun.
Sion for president?
That vayne got RAPED at the end tho, that triple knock up ....
im gonna try this now, hope i dont feed
no garentees :)
footage at 2:29 lost :^)

{{champion:14}} Yeah must of been some corrupt file, really weird :)
gota look into that xD

AD Sion has always been a solid build. Just hard to pull off because you need tons of stacks to make up for the health since you aren't building straight tank as usual.

But the Q's are just so god damn satisfying when you build AD.

And that ending with Cho'Gath and Vayne: PRICELESS.
RiP Jonny Bravo
Logged in just to say: *you're
